name: Keto Hamburger Buns Recipe
description: Bring the bun back to your burger with these easy keto hamburger buns that can bake while you grill.

author.name: Libby Jenkinson
author.jobTitle: Registered Pharmacist, Health Coach, Certificate in Advanced Nutrition
author.description: I'm Libby, a registered pharmacist, Health Coach, Certificate in Advanced Nutrition, mother of 3 and founder of Ditch The Carbs. Ditch The Carbs PRO and Low-Carb Practitioners - 3 of the world's top low-carb websites. My mission is simple. To make low-carb and keto simple and tasty for the whole family.

publisher.name: Ditch The Carbs
publisher.description: Easy tasty best low carb and keto recipes for the whole family. Sugar-free, gluten-free.

recipeInstructions.name: Preheat
recipeInstructions.text: Preheat your oven to 375°F/190°C. In a small bowl mix together your egg and apple cider vinegar. Set aside until ready to use.

recipeInstructions.name: Mix
recipeInstructions.text: Add your flax seen to a grinder or blender, coarsely grind. Pour the flax seed in a microwave safe bowl. Add the almond flour and shredded mozzarella cheese to the bowl and mix. Then add your cream cheese to the bowl. There is no need to mix the cream cheese in just yet.

recipeInstructions.name: Microwave
recipeInstructions.text: Place your bowl with the cheese in the microwave. Melt your cheese for 1 minute, remove the bowl and mix with a silicone spatula. If your cheese is not completely melted yet microwave for 30 more seconds until your cheese is completely melted.

recipeInstructions.name: Mix
recipeInstructions.text: While your mozzarella dough is still hot add your baking powder. Mix and fold together. Add the egg/vinegar mixture to your dough. Fold in with your silicone spatula.

recipeInstructions.name: Roll
recipeInstructions.text: Roll your dough into a ball and cut into 4 equal sections. Roll each section into a ball and then flatten the top and bottom of the ball to shape into a hamburger bun.

Place on a baking sheet lined with baking paper. Brush the olive oil over your buns and sprinkle the tops with sesame seeds. Bake in the oven at 375°F/190°C for 12-15 minutes. Your burger buns will be done when the tops are golden brown and the dough is cooked in the centre.

recipeInstructions.name: Bake
recipeInstructions.text: Remove the buns from the oven and let them cool on a wire rack or towel for 5 minutes before slicing and serving.

video.name: Keto hamburger buns and rolls
video.description: With Keto Hamburger Buns you can start enjoying your burgers with buns again in under 20 minutes for only 4.5g net carbs. These buns are so easy you can toss them together and cook them while grilling your patties! If you have been looking for a dinner roll recipe that is easy to throw together while dinner is cooking then this is the recipe for you!
